designScenario.name: Cooler Subsystem
designScenario.description: The Cooler Subsystem is a critical component of the aircraft's environmental control system, engineered to maintain cabin temperature within optimal ranges during flight. It employs a high-efficiency vapor-compression refrigeration cycle integrated with advanced thermal management technologies. Key features include a variable-speed compressor, smart phase-change material heat sinks, and a redundant sensor array. The subsystem is designed for low energy consumption, minimal noise output, and seamless interoperability with the aircraft's avionics and power management systems, ensuring passenger comfort and regulatory compliance under all flight conditions.

details.description: The cooler shall maintain cabin temperature between 18°C and 24°C with ±1°C deviation under nominal flight conditions.
The subsystem must achieve full cooling capacity within 2 seconds of activation during rapid temperature spikes exceeding 25°C.
Cooling capacity must scale proportionally to external heat load variations (±5% efficiency tolerance).
Dual redundant temperature sensors must trigger automatic compressor shutdown if internal component temperatures exceed 70°C.
The system must maintain baseline cooling functionality via passive heat dissipation for 30 minutes in case of primary power failure.
All cooling components must support hot-swappable replacement with standardized quick-release connectors.
Diagnostic interfaces must provide real-time data logging for compressor wear, refrigerant levels, and heat exchanger efficiency.

systemComponents.name: Active Cooling Unit
systemComponents.description: Core refrigeration module responsible for heat extraction using a closed-loop vapor-compression cycle.

subComponents.name: Variable-Speed Compressor
subComponents.description: Scroll-type compressor with adaptive RPM control to modulate refrigerant pressure and flow.

subComponents.name: Phase-Change Condenser
subComponents.description: High-efficiency heat exchanger using nanomaterials for rapid thermal dissipation.

subComponents.name: Thermal Expansion Valve
subComponents.description: Electronically controlled valve regulating refrigerant flow to the evaporator matrix.

subComponents.name: Low-Pressure Evaporator
subComponents.description: Copper-alloy evaporator coil with integrated frost-prevention coating.

subComponents.name: Silent Axial Fan
subComponents.description: Brushless DC fan with aerodynamic blade design for uniform airflow distribution.

systemComponents.name: Thermal Sensing Array
systemComponents.description: Network of distributed sensors measuring cabin, component, and refrigerant temperatures.

systemComponents.name: Climate Control Processor
systemComponents.description: Flight-certified microcontroller managing cooling algorithms and system diagnostics.

systemComponents.name: Refrigerant Management System
systemComponents.description: Closed-loop refrigerant circuit with leak detection and recovery mechanisms.

subComponents.name: Pressure Regulator
subComponents.description: Automated valve maintaining optimal refrigerant pressure across flight altitudes.

subComponents.name: Liquid Separator
subComponents.description: Coalescing filter preventing liquid refrigerant from entering the compressor.

relationships.description: Integral component providing cooling functionality within the ECS architecture.
Dependent on refrigerant circulation and pressure regulation for operational integrity.
Communicates real-time thermal data via ARINC 664 protocol for flight deck monitoring.
Integral component within the cabin airflow distribution system.

attributes.name: Cooling Capacity
attributes.description: Maximum heat removal rate under standard atmospheric conditions.

attributes.name: Operating Altitude Range
attributes.description: Altitude envelope where cooling performance remains within specified tolerances.

attributes.name: Temperature Setpoint Accuracy
attributes.description: Precision of cabin temperature regulation under stable conditions.

attributes.name: Noise Emission
attributes.description: Maximum sound pressure level at 1 meter distance during full operation.

attributes.name: Energy Efficiency Ratio
attributes.description: Ratio of cooling capacity to electrical power consumption under nominal load.

comments.body: Hybrid refrigeration system with phase-change materials for rapid thermal response and dual sensor redundancy for fail-safe operation
